experience.position: Full Stack Developer & Mobile App Developer
experience.description: Working as a freelance developer with multiple startups to help them complete their dreams. Specializing in full-stack development, mobile app development, and complex system integrations across various industries including logistics, construction, and mapping.
achievements: Developed comprehensive driver and warehouse management systems for Hailify with 10K+ downloads
Built Gomo Fleet Delivery app for both Android and iOS platforms with cross-platform functionality
Created Certifire floorplan management system with PDF editing and annotation capabilities
Developed C-Map offline-first application with real-time sync between web and mobile platforms
Implemented complex offline synchronization solutions using PowerSync and Supabase
Delivered end-to-end solutions from concept to deployment for multiple startup clients

experience.description: Joined as a software engineer and progressed to senior role, focusing on mobile app development using Android Jetpack Compose and React Native technologies. Simultaneously managed multiple projects and led a team of developers.
achievements: Developed BetterHalf AI-powered matchmaking platform with 10L+ downloads and 3.6-star rating
Built uGeo geo-social platform for discovering local events and connecting communities
Led and managed a team of developers across multiple concurrent projects
Enhanced expertise in Android Jetpack Compose and React Native development
Implemented advanced features including AI algorithms, real-time chat, and payment integration

experience.description: Focused on developing Android apps and hybrid apps using React Native. Expanded knowledge in both native and hybrid app development while improving ability to understand client requirements and provide accurate project estimates.
achievements: Developed iO Carpool ride-sharing platform with payment integration and real-time location services
Provided end-to-end technical support for MYDAWA healthcare app as solo developer from India working with Ireland team
Enhanced skills in client requirement analysis and project estimation
Gained expertise in both native Android and React Native hybrid development

experience.description: Started as an Android trainee developer and progressed to Android developer role. Contributed to the completion of multiple Android native applications and gained experience in conducting technical interviews.
achievements: Successfully completed 7-8 Android native projects from development to deployment
Contributed to KFC Indonesia mobile app with 1M+ downloads on Google Play Store
Developed Hyer job search app connecting businesses to on-demand labor
Conducted technical interviews for the firm, helping in recruitment process
Gained expertise in Android native development and mobile app lifecycle
